room_title: Escape room "Timebomb" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: We went as a team building activity with coworkers. We had a good turnout and an even greater time! We saved the day in Timebomb! It was a little difficult to get started on the puzzles but we realized (with Christina's helpful hints) that the better we worked together, the better we were at solving the puzzles. We did not know what to expect but we had a lot of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Timebomb" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: Solved Timebomb with a group of coworkers and escaped with 3 minutes to spare! The puzzle had some electronic components that actually fizzled out halfway through the game, so the host had to time us on his smartphone. That took away a little of the excitement, but it was still fun! Would do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Timebomb" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: Our group of 7 had a great time despite being obliterated by the nuclear bomb! Definitely worth it!

room_title: Escape room "Timebomb" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: We went here for a team-building event with a group of twelve. With 42 seconds left, we won and deactivated the bomb. Go team!

room_title: Escape room "Timebomb" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
review: Great puzzles, friendly staff, and inventive story. Definitely worth it.
